languages.text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.
languages.original_text: Бой начинается с фазы расстановки — в это время персонажи не могут атаковать или совершать другие действия, но могут занять выгодные позиции. Выберите персонажа кликом [ЛКМ] по его портрету вверху экрана, затем снова кликните [ЛКМ] в той клетке, куда хотите его переместить. Красные клетки означают недоступную для персонажа зону. В раунд расстановки персонаж может перемещаться на максимум его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но не может подойти к врагу вплотную. Нажмите [{bind|Pause}], чтобы начать бой.

traits.locale_text: Combat begins with zero round — during this round the characters cannot attack or take other actions, but they can take advantageous positions. During a zero round, you can move each character in your party up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, but no closer than one cell to the opponent (the distance may vary in different combats). The deployment round will not be available if you are ambushed by enemies. Click [LMB] on the character and then on the cell to move it. Once you have placed all the characters, press "Start the battle" or [{bind|Pause}].

Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

languages.text: Бой начинается с фазы расстановки — в это время персонажи не могут атаковать или совершать другие действия, но могут занять выгодные позиции. Выберите персонажа кликом [ЛКМ] по его портрету вверху экрана, затем снова кликните [ЛКМ] в той клетке, куда хотите его переместить. Красные клетки означают недоступную для персонажа зону. В раунд расстановки персонаж может перемещаться на максимум его {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, но не может подойти к врагу вплотную. Нажмите [{bind|Pause}], чтобы начать бой.

每场战斗开始时都会有个战术阶段。战术阶段期间，所有角色都无法攻击，也无法采取其他行动，但可以尝试占据有利位置。 鼠标左键点击屏幕顶部人物头像，选择您想移动的角色，之后在目标格子内再次点击鼠标左键。红色格子代表角色无法前往的区域。在战术阶段，队伍中的每位角色都可以以最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，但不能移动到敌人身边。 按下[{bind|Pause}]开始战斗。
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: 每场战斗开始时都会有个战术阶段。战术阶段期间，所有角色都无法攻击，也无法采取其他行动，但可以尝试占据有利位置。 鼠标左键点击屏幕顶部人物头像，选择您想移动的角色，之后在目标格子内再次点击鼠标左键。红色格子代表角色无法前往的区域。在战术阶段，队伍中的每位角色都可以以最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}进行移动，但不能移动到敌人身边。 按下[{bind|Pause}]开始战斗。

languages.text: 戦闘は戦術フェーズから開始し、このフェーズの間、キャラクターは攻撃や他のアクションを取ることはできないが、有利な位置を取ろうとすることはできる。 画面上にあるポートレートの上で [LMB] をクリックしてキャラクターを選択し、キャラクターの移動先のセルの上で [LMB] をクリックする。赤いセルは、キャラクターがアクセスできないエリアだ。戦術フェーズ中、部隊の各キャラクターは最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}まで移動できるが、敵に隣接することはできない。 [{bind|Pause}]を押して戦闘開始しよう。
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: 戦闘は戦術フェーズから開始し、このフェイズの間、キャラクターは攻撃や他のアクションを取ることはできないが、有利な位置につこうとすることはできる。 画面上にあるポートレートの上で [LMB] をクリックしてキャラクターを選択し、キャラクターの移動先のセルの上で [LMB] をクリックする。赤いセルは、キャラクターがアクセスできないエリアである。戦術フェーズ中、パーティーの各キャラクターは最大{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移動ポイント{/g}まで移動できるが、敵に隣接することはできない。 [{bind|Pause}]を押して戦闘開始しよう。

languages.text: El combate da comienzo con la fase táctica. En ella los personajes no pueden atacar ni realizar otras acciones, pero sí intentar adoptar medidas que los pongan en ventaja. Selecciona un personaje pulsando el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre su retrato en la parte superior de la pantalla, luego haz clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre la casilla a la que quieras que tu personaje se mueva. El personaje no puede acceder a las zonas con celdas rojas. Durante la fase táctica, todos los personajes del grupo pueden emplear hasta su máximo de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse, pero no pueden situarse junto a un enemigo. Pulsa [{bind|Pause}] para comenzar la batalla.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: El combate da comienzo con la fase táctica. En ella los personajes no pueden atacar ni realizar otras acciones, pero sí intentar adoptar medidas que los pongan en ventaja. Selecciona un personaje pulsando el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre su retrato en la parte superior de la pantalla, luego haz clic con el [botón izquierdo del ratón] sobre la casilla a la que quieras que tu personaje se mueva. El personaje no puede acceder a las zonas con celdas rojas. Durante la fase táctica, todos los personajes del grupo pueden emplear hasta su máximo de {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}puntos de movimiento{/g} para moverse, pero no pueden situarse junto a un enemigo. Pulsa [{bind|Pause}] para comenzar la batalla.

languages.text: Der Kampf beginnt mit der taktischen Phase, in der die Charaktere nicht angreifen oder andere Aktionen ausführen, aber versuchen können, vorteilhafte Positionen einzunehmen. Wähle einen Charakter aus, indem du mit [LMB] auf sein Porträt oben auf dem Bildschirm klickst und dann mit [LMB] auf das Feld klickst, zu dem sich der Charakter bewegen soll. Rote Felder sind Bereiche, die für den Charakter unzugänglich sind. Während der taktischen Phase kann sich jeder Charakter der Gruppe bis zu seinen maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkten{/g} bewegen, aber er kann sich nicht neben einem Feind positionieren. Drücke [{bind|Pause}], um den Kampf zu beginnen.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: Der Kampf beginnt mit der taktischen Phase, in der die Charaktere nicht angreifen oder andere Aktionen ausführen können, aber versuchen können, vorteilhafte Positionen einzunehmen. Wähle einen Charakter aus, indem du mit der [LMB] auf sein Porträt oben auf dem Bildschirm klickst und dann mit [LMB] auf das Feld klickst, zu dem sich der Charakter bewegen soll. Rote Zellen sind Bereiche, die für den Charakter unzugänglich sind. Während der taktischen Phase kann sich jeder Charakter der Gruppe bis zu seinen maximalen {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}Bewegungspunkten{/g} bewegen, aber er kann sich nicht neben einem Feind positionieren. Drücke [{bind|Pause}], um den Kampf zu beginnen.

languages.text: Le combat commence par la phase tactique durant laquelle les personnages ne peuvent ni attaquer ni effectuer d'autres actions, mais peuvent essayer d'adopter des positions avantageuses. Pour sélectionner un personnage, cliquez avec le [LMB] sur son portrait en haut de l'écran, puis cliquez avec le [LMB] sur la case vers laquelle vous souhaitez que le personnage se déplace. Les cases rouges correspondent à des zones inaccessibles au personnage. Lors de la phase tactique, chaque personnage du groupe peut se déplacer à hauteur de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} maximum, mais ne peut pas se positionner à proximité d'un ennemi. Appuyez sur [{bind|Pause}] pour commencer le combat.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.

traits.locale_text: Le combat commence par la phase tactique durant laquelle les personnages ne peuvent ni attaquer ni effectuer d'autres actions, mais peuvent essayer d'adopter des positions avantageuses. Pour sélectionner un personnage, cliquez avec le [LMB] sur son portrait en haut de l'écran, puis cliquez avec le [LMB] sur la case vers laquelle vous souhaitez que le personnage se déplace. Les cases rouges correspondent à des zones inaccessibles au personnage. Lors de la phase tactique, chaque personnage du groupe peut se déplacer à hauteur de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}points de déplacement{/g} maximum, mais ne peut pas se positionner à proximité d'un ennemi. Appuyez sur [{bind|Pause}] pour commencer le combat.

languages.text: Çatışma, taktik evresi ile başlar. Karakterler, bu evrede saldıramaz veya başka bir eylemde bulunamazlar ancak avantajlı konumlara geçmeye çalışabilirler. Ekranın üst kısmındaki portresine sol fare tuşu ile tıklayarak bir karakter seç, ardından ilerlemesini istediğin hücreye sol fare tuşu ile tıkla. Kırmızı hücreler karakterin erişemediği alanlardır. Taktik evresindeyken, gruptaki her karakter maksimum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}hareket puanı{/g} kadar ilerleyebilir ancak düşmana bitişik bir konum alamaz. Çatışmayı başlatmak için [{bind|Pause}] tuşuna bas.
languages.original_text: Combat begins with the tactical phase, during which characters cannot attack or take other actions but may try to take up advantageous positions. Select a character by clicking [LMB] on their portrait at the top of the screen, then click [LMB] on the cell you want the character to move to. Red cells are areas inaccessible to the character. During the tactical phase, each character in the party may move up to their maximum {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}movement points{/g} but cannot position themselves adjacent to an enemy. Press [{bind|Pause}] to start the battle.
